description: Penguins at the California Academy of Sciences were given hearts to build their nests.
maintext: Penguins at the California Academy of Sciences were given hearts to build their nests.Every year handlers give out hearts to the African Penguins on Valentine's Day.It's a part of the "species survival plan" to grow the African Penguin population, which is considered endangered.
title: Penguins build nests out of Valentine's Day hearts
